info.title: Fynd Platform's Public Side APIs v2.1.0

get.description: Get Taxonomy Details for a given level
get.summary: getTaxonomyByLevel | Get Taxonomy Information by Level

parameters.name: level
parameters.description: The level of taxonomy hierarchy to fetch: 0: Fetch departments. 1: Fetch L1 categories. 2: Fetch L2 categories. 3: Fetch L3 categories.

parameters.name: l0_slug
parameters.description: Level 0 (Department) slug of the taxonomy to filter results.

parameters.name: l1_slug
parameters.description: Level 1 (L1 Category) slug of the taxonomy to filter results.

parameters.name: l2_slug
parameters.description: Level 2 (L2 Category) slug of the taxonomy to filter results.

parameters.name: l3_slug
parameters.description: Level 3 (L3 Category) slug of the taxonomy to filter results.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Applied limit on the number of items to be returned. Default is 5000.

422.description: Bad request. See the error object in the response body for specific reason

get.description: Provide application name or domain url.

parameters.name: location_type
parameters.description: Provide location type to query on. Possible values : country, state, city

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Field is optional when location_type is country. If querying for state, provide id of country. If querying for city, provide id of state.

get.description: get basic platform information on Admin panel like Common Settings, Appereance of  Authentication Page, Text on Seller Login or Register Page, Business Account Restrictions, Seller Support Details and Footer Details

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: type param is type of device

200.description: Successful response with menu content by type

get.summary: getCustomPage | Retrieve info for custom page.
get.description: Retrieve info of custom pagee to develop and manage custom webpages.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: unique identifier created for each feature object in the schema.

200.description: Retrieve info of custom pagee to develop and manage custom webpages.

404.description: Internal Server Error. See the error object in the response body to know the exact reason.

get.description: Retrieve home page content for a specific page type.

parameters.name: page_type
parameters.description: The type of the page (e.g., pricing).

200.description: Successful response with home page content.
Successful response with pricing banner information.

get.summary: getAllTags | Retrieve tags with injected css/javascript info.
get.description: Retrieve custom tag with injected css/javascript info.

200.description: Retrieve all tags with injected css/javascript info.

get.summary: getCredentialsByEntity | Get credentials to power chat support systems

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about panel extensions in the public server setup.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: pass the slug of the extension

listing_info.name: ujjawal-example-extension-1
listing_info.tagline: test-extension for test how extensions look and work and how to create them

get.description: Retrieve a list of all webhook events in the public server setup.

event_configs.description: This event gets triggered when an article is created

post.description: Query and obtain detailed information about webhook events in the public server configurations.

event_configs.description: This event gets triggered when an article is created

get.description: Notifies all the events that are subscribed and are going to deprecate or new version is available for those events
get.summary: notifyDepricatedEvent | Notifies all the events that are going to depricate

post.summary: validateSchema | Validate Schema for an event

TaxonomyItemAttributeSchemaObject.description: A schema definition detailing the type and any constraints on the attribute.

type.description: The data type of the attribute".

mandatory.description: Specifies if the attribute is mandatory.

name.description: The name of the attribute, such as "Color" or "Size".

slug.description: A URL-friendly identifier for the attribute, which is used for filtering or querying.

uid.description: Unique identifier for the taxonomy item.

name.description: The name of the taxonomy item. For example, it could be the name of a department or category.

slug.description: A URL-friendly identifier for the taxonomy item. The slug differs based on the level: - At level 0, it refers to the department. - At level 1, it refers to the L1 category. - At level 2, it refers to the L2 category. - At level 3, it refers to the L3 category.

level.description: The level level of the taxonomy item in the hierarchy: - 0: Department - 1: L1 category - 2: L2 category - 3: L3 category

attributes.description: A list of attributes associated with the taxonomy item, such as color or size. These attributes may differ depending on the level of the taxonomy.

product_template_slug.description: A slug identifier for the template associated with this taxonomy item. It links the taxonomy to a specific product template.

product_template_name.description: A Name for the template associated with this taxonomy item. It links the taxonomy to a specific product template.

items.description: List of taxonomy items for the requested level level. Each item represents a taxonomy node with details about its category, attributes, and associated template.

message.description: A brief description of the error encountered.

field.description: The field in the request that caused the error.

verified.description: Indicates domain is verified or not. TXT and A records should propagate correctly.

is_primary.description: Indicates domain is primary or not. Primary domain is the default/main domain.

is_shortlink.description: Shortlink is present or not for the domain

_id.description: The unique identifier (24-digit Mongo Object ID) of the domain

is_predefined.description: Domain is hosting domain or not

enabled.description: Shows whether sales channel website URL is enabled or not

basepath.description: Base path for the current sales channel website

items.description: List of all the domains added to the sales channel

enabled.description: Shows sales channel auth is enabled or not enabled.

redirect_from.description: Old domain URL of the sales channel

redirect_to.description: New domain URL of the sales channel. Users will be automatically redirected from old domain to new domain.

type.description: It shows domain redirection type. Permanent redirection is for long time period redirection, and temporary redirection for a short time period.

name.description: Indicates the name of application meta

value.description: Value related to application meta name

description.description: It contains detailed information about the sales channel

channel_type.description: It indicates different channel types like store, website-and-mobile-apps. Default value is store.

cache_ttl.description: An integer value that specifies the number of seconds until the key expires

is_internal.description: Indicates whether a sales channel is internal or not

is_active.description: Indicates whether a sales channel is active or not active

_id.description: The unique identifier (24-digit Mongo Object ID) of the sales channel

name.description: Name of the sales channel, e.g. Zenz Fashion

owner.description: The unique identifier (24-digit Mongo Object ID) of owner who owns the application

company_id.description: Numeric ID allotted to a business account where the sales channel exists

token.description: Randomly generated fixed-length string for sales channel. It is required and auto-generated.

created_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of sales channel creation

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of sales channel updation

__v.description: Version key for tracking revisions. Default value is zero.

app_type.description: It shows whether application is live or in development mode

id.description: The unique identifier for the event configuration.

event_schema.description: The schema defining the event data structure.

version.description: The version of the event configuration.

display_name.description: A user-friendly name for the event.

description.description: A detailed description of the event.

created_on.description: The timestamp when the event configuration was created.

updated_on.description: The timestamp when the event configuration was last updated.

group.description: The group to which the event belongs.

event_configs.description: A list of event configuration details.

version.description: The version of the event configuration.

message.description: The message to be sent in the notification.

emails.description: List of email addresses to notify.

EventSchema.description: Defines the structure for event payload and metadata.

InternalTransformEvent.description: Represents the internal structure of a transformation event.

trace_id.description: List of trace IDs related to the event.

name.description: The name of the transformation event.

type.description: The type of the transformation event.

version.description: The version of the transformation event.

created_timestamp.description: The timestamp when the event was created.

TransformEventData.description: Contains detailed event data for processing transformation events.

company_id.description: The company ID associated with the event.

contains.description: List of strings related to the event.

TransformEventServiceMeta.description: Contains metadata name related to the transformation service.

name.description: The name of the transformation service.

TransformEventAssociation.description: Contains association details for a transformation event.

company_id.description: The company ID associated with the event.

event_name.description: The name of the event to validate.

event_version.description: The version of the event to validate.

event_schema.description: The schema defining the structure of the event.

status.description: Indicates whether the schema is valid (true) or invalid (false).

message.description: A message providing additional details about the validation result.

event_trace_id.description: List of trace IDs related to the transformation event.

event_name.description: The name of the transformation event.

version.description: The version of the transformation event.

status.description: The status of the event processing.

event_type.description: The type of the transformation event.

value.name: Fynd Platform
value.title: Fynd Platform
value.meta_title: Build your own ecommerce website today test
value.meta_description: Build your professional online business using our ultimate e-commerce platform. We deliver a leading omnichannel ecosystem and cloud solutions to manage your enterprise website. test

whats_new.description: Effective navigation and enhanced support for integrations
Quick-help and announcements for user assistance and operability
Audience, rewards and campaigns to attract visitors
Manage company, brands and stores from one place
Adding products and inventory data is easier than ever before
Add marketplaces, such as Amazon, Flipkart, Tata Cliq and many more from Fynd Platform
Supports the flow of catalogue and order data from other e-commerce platforms and inventory aggregators

features.title: Create brand website & mobile app
features.text: Even if you are not an expert in creating a website or mobile applications, you can get it done from Fynd platform in less than 10 minutes.
list: Fully featured website with custom pages

features.title: Language support
features.text: We provide multiple language support to cater our diverse audience all across the globe!

features.title: Blog, Forum & Chat
features.text: Weave your own community of users, generate ideas and innovate unique solutions! Get access to ask and answer questions on chats and forums.

features.title: User & API Documentation
features.text: Utilize the vast encyclopaedia of Fynd platform product suite which is extensively covered in documentation. Get all the platform APIs and build your own e-commerce business!

features.title: Training materials
features.text: Get redirected to help guides and videos while using any feature of Fynd Platform with the help of quick help.

features.title: Seller panel
features.text: New to e-commerce? Don't worry we will simplify it for you. Get onboarded in no time and get your inventory up online in no time! Start Selling!

features.title: Development kits
features.text: Use development kits to create your own custom pages and themes. Plus, you can do a lot more with the kits owing to its intuitiveness and ease of usage.

features.title: Payment system
features.text: Payment systems are vital for running a business smoothly. You can always opt from an inexhaustive list of payment modes that you want your application to support.

features.title: Multiple customization
features.text: Now customize the appearance of your application by changing its colour and themes. Choose the elements to be displayed on the product page, landing page, home, cart and registration page.

features.title: Authentication & access management
features.text: Set the access level of staff towards the usage of your application. Control the registration and login options and their subsequent display on its respective pages.

features.title: Marketing Collection & Coupons
features.text: Customize and create your own collection of products. Moreover, you can create your own coupons from a variety of examples.

features.title: ML-assistance
features.text: Now, get a list of visually similar products when your customer lands on a product page.

features.title: Marketplace catalogue generation
features.text: Now run your business by uploading your catalogue across:

features.title: QR Features
features.text: Redefine the sharing of URL and links with the help of QR code. Now you can share:

features.title: Data insights with tracking & analytics
features.text: Get figures and data from cart, order and payment in graph and tables. Download them in PDF and CSV too! Use application tokens like Firebase, MoEngage, Segment and GTM for application analytics.

features.title: Feedback capture mechanism
features.text: Now you will know your customers better! Provide your consumers with an option to provide their invaluable feedback and suggestions.

features.title: Store setup with staff management system
features.text: Got a banner and logo for your business? Upload in no time and view it across all channels. Send Invites and Add people to your staff. Set their access levels, incentivize and manage effectively.

features.title: Creation of site legal docs like Policy, T&C and FAQ
features.text: Create your privacy policy, usage and other policies, terms and conditions and FAQs.

features.title: Order Management System
features.text: Get your order management system and track the order lifecycle of the products ordered by your consumers. Manage delivery and refunds too.

testimonial.comment: Having a website or online presence is crucial for any business. However, for a non tech business like ours, it is challenging to invest too much on tech infrastructure. But Fynd has trivialised this obstacle for us by providing a cost effective platform to set up our online store and give our users a seamless shopping experience. A special mention to the team who provide support and guidance at every step.
testimonial.name: Pooja Karegoudar & Tanushree Ishani D

pageHead.title: Get your business online today!
pageHead.subtitle: Build your ecommerce website/app and sell on different marketplaces with the help of Fynd Platform.

selectPlan.text: Choose a plan that suits your business goals

features.title: Grow your business
features.subtitle: Grow your brand by reaching more customers online.

secondaryImages.text: Get easy-to-use design tools and professional themes to build responsive websites and mobile apps.
List your products on Amazon, Flipkart, Myntra, AJIO, Tata CLiQ, Fynd, Uniket in a single click.
Get shipping, payment gateway and marketing in a single agreement.

features.title: Manage your business
features.subtitle: Get all your business insights at one place. Effortlessly manage orders, payments, logistics in one dashboard.

secondaryImages.text: Update your catalogue and inventory using Excel/CSV with the bulk upload option.
Sync price change and quantities in real-time on all the marketplaces.
Monitor your business performance using analytic tools.

features.title: Promote your business
features.subtitle: Increase your sales by using our in-built promotional and marketing tools.

secondaryImages.text: Run promotional campaigns using email and SMS that reach your customers at just the right time.
Create handpicked collections and coupons that attract customers and lead them to checkout.
Launch reward points for new signups, referrals, and for placing orders.

learningLinks.title: Platform that supports you at every step

learningArray.title: On-Demand support
learningArray.body: A help desk to offer technical support and resolve your queries.

learningArray.title: Learning Hub
learningArray.body: Get access to user guides and tutorial videos for operating Fynd Platform.

learningArray.title: Community of Partners
learningArray.body: Receive support from a community of coders, designers, and freelancers.

testimonial.title: What our clients say
testimonial.subtitle: Don't just take our words for it. Check what our clients say about us.

testimonialArray.comment: Fynd Platform is extremely user-friendly. Everything from uploading pictures to order tracking is very convenient. As a brand, Fynd has been a perfect platform for us to grow in the easiest possible manner. I would recommend this platform to anyone who would like to scale up their business.
testimonialArray.name: Nidhi Seth

testimonialArray.comment: Fynd is the first company through which we took our footwear online. Fynd Platform has been instrumental in m company's success.
testimonialArray.name: Niyati Gogri

testimonialArray.comment: It was amazing working with the Fynd team they helped me through each and every step and helped me build my website from scratch.
testimonialArray.name: Asmita Kala

startTrial.title: It only takes 30 seconds to get started
startTrial.subtitle: No coding required

panel.description: Fynd is the first company through which we took our recycled footwear online. It is a very transparent process and is helping us a lot.
